about_the_game:
Spitfire – Moonpie's Mission Soundtrack

Dive into the world of Spitfire – Moonpie's Mission and experience the unique soundtrack of a game that hooks you from the very first moment. Join the brave alpaca, Moonpie, as it battles a mysterious alien parasite on a mission that quickly turns into an epic adventure.

 

The Spitfire – Moonpie's Mission Soundtrack features all 29 original tracks from the game, as well as 4 bonus tracks that didn’t make it into the final version but were still an important part of the creative process. These pieces offer a rare glimpse into the unused music, each telling its own story and adding depth to the overall experience.

 

I’m especially proud to share that I created this soundtrack with the help of an AI tool, which assisted me in recording my voice, creating choral arrangements, producing vocal tracks, and much more. Additionally, I wrote all the song lyrics myself to perfectly complement the story and atmosphere of the game. Afterward, I used Audacity to fine-tune and perfect the tracks for the game.

 

From high-energy action scenes to unexpected musical moments, this soundtrack is the perfect way for fans to continue the Spitfire – Moonpie's Mission journey outside the game. Get your hands on the full soundtrack, including exclusive bonus tracks, and immerse yourself in the musical world of this extraordinary mission!
